entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
